parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.74

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Tree View

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns string data from item on given path. IDC means id of parent Tree View.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''tvData''' [idc, [path]]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [idc, [path]]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> [path]: [[Array]] - Array containing numbers.

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> control '''tvData''' [path]

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> [path]: [[Array]] - Array containing numbers.

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[String]] - (as above).

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[tvData]] [101, [0]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>(_display [[displayCtrl]] 101) [[tvData]] [0];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[tvAdd]], [[tvClear]], [[tvCollapse]], [[tvCount]], [[tvCurSel]], [[tvDelete]], [[tvExpand]], [[tvPicture]], [[tvSetCurSel]], [[tvSetData]], [[tvSetPicture]], [[tvSetValue]], [[tvSort]], [[tvSortByValue]], [[tvText]], [[tvValue]]
</value></part></template></root>
